title: Bug 120315: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not have any effect.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Observe that the label is still visible in the PDF output.
